Universal City, California : Universal Pictures Home Entertainment, [2017] 1 Blu-ray videodisc (119 min.) : sound, color ; 4 3/4 in. + 1 videodisc (119 min. : sound, color ; 4 3/4 in.) two-dimensional moving image tdi rdacontent video v rdamedia videodisc vd rdacarrier digital optical surround 5.1 DTS-HD MA DTS digital surround 2.0 DTS digital surround 5.1 rda video file Blu-ray 1080p high definition region A rda Motion picture. Blu-ray disc requires Blu-ray player. Title from disc surface. Originally released as a motion picture in 2017. Special features: Deleted scenes. Music by David Holmes. Channing Tatum, Adam Driver, Seth McFarlane, Riley Keough, Katie Holmes; Katherine Waterston; Dwight Yoakam, Sebastian Stan; Brian Gleeson, Jack Quaid; Hilary Swank, Daniel Craig. Trying to reverse a family curse, brothers Jimmy and Clyde Logan set out to execute an elaborate robbery during the legendary Coca-Cola 600 race at the Charlotte Motor Speedway. In a fun twist, six NASCAR stars pop up in non-driver cameo roles in the film. Rating: PG-13; for language and some crude comments CHV rating: 14A. Blu-ray: 1080p high definition; widescreen (2.40:1); DTS-HD Master Audio 5.1, DTS Digital Surround 2.0; 2.0 descriptive audio. DVD: region 1; Dolby Digital 5.1; anamorphic widescreen (2.40:1) presentation. English or French dialogue; Spanish or French subtitles.
